name: Baller 2 Open Beta
description:
Development in progress, The beta looks like a tech demo but it is. When the game will be fully released it will be ported into exe aswell as .exe.

An android port is not likely gonna be released, but its not impossible.

Credits:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIWlCE2kt0RXCJLRp8HjhiQ For helping me for the scripts 

https://www.youtube.com/c/Brackeys Main menu

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfq4EmTqbGu_BXPQ7TmAUdQ helping me porting into html5.

Controls:

W A S D to move

KeyPad plus to spawn balls

Mouse for camera mouvment
